articles.title: US sues UBS over alleged crisis-era mortgage securities fraud
articles.description: UBS was accused of misleading investors about the quality of more than $41 billion of subprime and other risky mortgage loans backing 40 securities offerings in 2006 and 2007, the Department of Justice said.
articles.content: The U.S. government on Thursday filed a civil fraud lawsuit accusing UBS Group, Switzerland's largest bank, of defrauding investors in its sale of residential mortgage-backed securities leading up to the 2008-2009 global financial crisis. UBS was accused of m… [+1545 chars]
